snippet.title: Undead Citadel - First Combat Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit our website for more information: http://www.undeadcitadel.com

"Indeed darkness has befallen our lands, but hey... its not so bad. At least the dead do not cry before I crush their heads in." - Sir Anvil Capheus

This is the first official trailer focused on combat for Undead Citadel, an action-packed title exclusively built for VR that relies on a hybrid physics-driven combat system.

To be released further on in 2019 for HTC Vive, PSVR, Oculus Rift, and Windows Mixed Reality.
